Posts.Content: May 16, 2011 11:08PM safari94 wrote: Hello ladies! I am just joining and so glad to hear all of your input and words of encouragement! I was on the Feb Chemo board and finished 4 x TC on April 7th.  Just had my 5/30 of rads today.  It is all so scary but nothing could be worse than chemo - right?!?! Well, I just wanted to say hi and thanks to all for being here! Lots of hugs and positive energy to all..... Mary
Posts.Title: May 2011 Radiation Pinkprincess GabbyCal
